title: Full Metal Jayce has the voice of the normal Jayce
body:
Hi Riot

The Full Metal Jayce skin has lost its special voice-over in Patch 5.22 - can this be fixed? It is part of the skin identity :D

Also, while ur at it, can u buff him at the same time? Please :))))))))

replies.body:
Hey Sniperkaj,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and it should be resolved with the next patch.
I hope they fix this soon just got the skin as a mystery skin
